valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 11 Jan 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 12 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Atlantic low expected Hebrides 966 by midnight tonight

Viking.text:
Wind
Southerly or southeasterly 6 to gale 8, increasing gale 8 to storm 10, perhaps violent storm 11 later.
Sea state
Rough or very rough, becoming very rough or high.
Weather
Wintry showers then rain.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor.
